featured.text: It is believed that the martial art was connected with tribal fighting in Africa, in which people fought body to body, without weapons, in order to acquire a bride or desired woman.
With pink cherry blossoms blooming everywhere, the valley ______ like a young bride under the bright spring sunshine.

definition.zh_def: 新娘；在婚禮上與新郎結婚的女性。
definition.en_def: A woman on her wedding day or just before and after the event.
definition.example: The bride walked down the aisle, glowing in her beautiful white dress.
